description:
[h1]WARNING: Having file mods installed while playing with this custom game [i]could cause issues[/i]! One of the most well known ones is unbreakable crates that occur while having fant mod installed.[/h1]

[h1]This Mod Adds Features From Axolot Games' Other Title, [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/648800/Raft/]Raft[/url]![/h1]
[b]Play the game in a completely new and different way than ever before![/b]

[h1]INSTALLATION:[/h1]

[b]1. Subscribe to this mod[/b]
[b]2. Launch Scrap Mechanic and press the custom game button above the creative game loader[/b]
[b]3. Select this mod from the list and then load into the world and play![/b]

[b] NOTE: You do not have to manually install this mod[/b]

[h1]For information on importing your old raft into the new world , read the guide [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/2807590049/3391786569663862852/]here[/url][/h1]

Features:
[list]
[*][b]A story with quests that you have to complete to unlock new parts[/b]
[*]The world is a beautiful ocean to explore with new and custom tiles!
[*]A sharkbot that lurks beneath the water...
[*]New tools and weapons:
[list]
[*]Axe
[*]Pickaxe
[*]Harpoon Gun
[*]Pulling Hook
[*]Fishing Rod
[/list]
[*]New logic blocks:
[list]
[*]WASD Converter
[*]Water Sensor
[/list]
[*]New parts:
[list]
[*]Propeller(small and big)
[*]Sail & Wind Sock
[*]Farms you can PLACE down 
[*]Air Tank
[*]Water Purifier
[*]Apiary
[*]Collector to collect ocean junk
[*]Creation Rotator
[*][i]And many more![/i]
[/list]
[*]Adjusted some things:
[list]
[*]Loot has been adjusted to be less grindy
[*]Resources such as Component Kits can be crafted now
[*]Farmbots no longer drop warehouse keys
[/list]
[/list]

[h1]Join our official Discord Server![/h1]
https://discord.gg/anmVQRD3

Translations:
[list]
    [*]Italian - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Fagiano0]Fagiano[/url]
    [*]French - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/corv0s]Corvos[/url]
    [*]German - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198824292425]DavidWarNichtVerf√ºgbar[/url]
    [*]Polish - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199100233083/]Cookiez_1[/url] & [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/DartFrogYT/]Dart Frog[/url]
    [*]Brazilian - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/erickxavier/]ErickXavierS[/url]
    [*]Russian - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Oleg4260/]Oleg4260[/url]
[/list]

If you enjoy this mod, don't forget to rate it!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
name: Raft Mechanic [CUSTOM GAME]
